item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: 'No soldiers' from US needed in Gaza, Trump says
item.description: President Donald Trump has begun his second administration with a series of controversial moves and decisions.

item.title: WATCH: Unconscious man rescued from spinning boat
item.description: Emergency crews rushed to a lake near Orlando, Florida, where a boat was spinning in circles, apparently out of control.

item.title: Suitcase with human remains inside discovered in New York City's East River
item.description: Human remains have been found in a suitcase that was drifting in the East River in New York City, police said.

item.title: As the Super Bowl nears, New Orleans grapples with how safe is safe enough
item.description: A terrorist attack in New Orleans on New Year's Day that killed 14 people rattled the city. Some worry it remains vulnerable.
